entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 11
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos from the special event 2003-0000 Morning Rest, Pune, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 highs resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: 2003 Collection.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries

link.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention the new Album Shri Mataji's Places that currently has 5 galleries and that singles out special Moments of Growth around Śhrī Mātājī!'s Places and the 3 new galleries Awards, Diplomas and Recognitions, India Tour by a photographer, and Parades added to the Album Moments of Growth.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
